selectionPrompt: Choose only events that move markets or strategy: deals with terms, earnings with guidance changes, rate/policy moves, or major pivots. Prefer filings, transcripts, and numbers.
essencePrompt: 3 bullets: 1) What changed and the numbers (deal size, EPS, guidance), 2) Who’s impacted (sectors/regions), 3) Operator/investor implication with a scenario. 60–120 words.
perspectivesPrompt: Three one‑liners: 1) Market reaction vs fundamentals, 2) Strategic move for peers/customers, 3) Risk/path over next 1–3 quarters.
